content: Landing back in NYC, the skyline\'s a familiar sight but feels different now. Japan\'s zen gardens and minimalist design have me seeing the city\'s chaos in a new light. It\'s like I\'ve got this \'Wabi-Sabi\' lens on, appreciating the beauty in imperfection. Makes me wonder, could we apply this to tech? Imagine a blockchain that celebrates its quirks rather than striving for perfection. Time to sketch out some ideas with a cup of matcha in hand. 🗼🌸"', type='text')]
